# map

**Instance Property**

The map that the framework adds the annotation to.

## Declaration

```swift
get map(): Map | null;
set map(_: Map | null);
```

## Discussion

This property is `null` before MapKit JS adds the annotation to a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Map], and after MapKit JS removes the annotation from a `mapkit.Map`.

## Getting the map and element

- **element**: The annotation’s element in the DOM.
